item.title: Exposing Dropwizard metrics to Prometheus
item.dc:creator: Brian Brazil
item.description: If you've an existing instrumentation library in use, it's not always practical to immediately switch to a Prometheus instrumentation library. There are a multitude of integrations available to aid your transition.   Dropwizard metrics is a popular instrumentation library for the JVM. While it lacks labels and tends to do calculations in the client rather […]
